name: Bender of The Universe
description:
•We cannot pass the obstacles on the road ourselves.

•Our power is to create clones.

•We can create four different clones (Earth, Air, Water, Fire) and these four clones have their own feature.

1.Earth: Protection against predatory plants.
2.Air: Can jump higher.
3.Water:  Can walk in the water.
4.Fire: Immune to fire.
